title: RtOC - MIST SD LAN/WLAN - Process design
description:
Description
As a customer
I want to receive an offer for a MIST SD LAN/WLAN solution that considers all my requirements, that makes clear which parameters and information I must contribute.
So that I can discuss details with the account manager and get an agreement on a final offer.
  As a Telekom employee
I want to know what my role is and which tasks and process steps I go through to create a customer offer for a MIST SD LAN/WLAN solution, with a top user experience. I want to create the offer in PANDA/CPQ.
So that I can record all customer requirements and the enquiry with all the information runs through to the order entry.
acceptance_criteria: The commissioning of the DTA is considered
Coupling information in the site are considered
It is clear who executes which tasks
Interfaces and parameters to other systems are defined and coordinated
Documentation is finished (Aris â€“ Happy Path and Fallouts)

components.title: OKR#9_PI7 Issue an offer for SD LAN/WLAN product in PANDA/CPQ
